short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge Chrome with commands, shortcuts, and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your Chrome experience with TabBar – the ultimate tool for mastering browser commands, shortcuts, and beyond.

Unleash the power of Chrome like a pro with TabBar's intuitive command interface. Effortlessly manage tabs, bookmarks, and browser history while executing a variety of actions to enhance your productivity.

Key Features:
🗄 Seamlessly switch, open, close, and search tabs
📚 Browse and organize bookmarks effortlessly
🔍 Quickly search your browsing history
⚡️ Over 50 actions to supercharge your productivity
🔮 Special commands for advanced filtering and actions
🧩 Integrations with Notion, Figma, Docs, Asana, and more
⌨️ Handy shortcuts for muting, pinning, bookmarking, and more
⚙️ Advanced settings to troubleshoot browsing issues
🌙 Enjoy a sleek Dark Mode
...and much more – all for free, and no sign-in required!
